Package blockchain

Class Block

java.lang.Object
blockchain.Block
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefiBlock, HCBlock
public abstract class Block extends Object implements Serializable
The Block class is an abstract class representing a generic block in a blockchain. It provides common attributes and methods that are shared among different types of blocks.
See Also:
